author: tersec
content: On the builder API end, there's no sense of "unregister" of which I'm aware. The Beacon API is basically a wrapper around https://github.com/ethereum/builder-specs/blob/main/apis/builder/validators.yaml

author: tersec
content: Anything beyond queuing up that validator for that builder API call is kind of a side-effect not specified by either the beacon or builder APIs

author: jameshe5018
content: in our case the side affect is from an operator which may have partial registration where some validators want to use the relay while others may have been registered in the past but would no longer want to use the relay and tracking those on the beacon node side. It seems like most others are simply expiring it after some time.
